column2: Bavette's Las Vegas...we are headed your way this weekend and really hoping it's 2 for 2!! I'm generally somewhat ambivalent about the Las Vegas outpost dining scene
column3: feeling that too often no one is really paying attention due to the high volume turnover. I'll admit it
column4: I'm still scarred from an horrific experience a decade ago at a Batali-owned joint after a stellar one at Mozza in LA. But I digress. Fingers crossed and dreams of sourdough and Gorgonzola dancing in my head...
